title: Ep. 799 - America Goes Through Puberty
description:
Prominent leftists diss America on Independence Day, the nation’s largest teachers’ union promises to push CRT in all 50 states, and NPR adds a trigger warning to the Declaration of Independence.
My new book ’Speechless: Controlling Words, Controlling Minds,’ is now available wherever books are sold. Grab your copy today here: https://utm.io/udtMJ 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
